sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

{{userProfile.name}}

{{userProfile.title}}

{{userProfile.coursesCompleted}} Courses
{{userProfile.hoursLearned}} Hours
{{userProfile.certificates}} Certificates

üìù About

{{userProfile.bio}}

üéØ Skills

{{skill.name}}

üèÜ Achievements

{{achievement.icon}}

{{achievement.title}}

{{achievement.description}}

üìä Learning Activity

{{day.day}}

üìö Recent Courses

{{course.title}}

{{course.progress}}%

üéì Certificates

üèÜ

{{cert.title}}

{{cert.issuer}} ‚Ä¢ {{cert.date}}

`, styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { userProfile = { name: 'Alex Johnson', title: 'Full Stack Developer & Lifelong Learner', avatar: 'https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=3', bio: 'Passionate developer with 5+ years of experience. Love learning new technologies and sharing knowledge with the community.', coursesCompleted: 24, hoursLearned: 156, certificates: 8, skills: [ { name: 'JavaScript', level: 90 }, { name: 'React', level: 85 }, { name: 'Node.js', level: 80 }, { name: 'Python', level: 75 }, { name: 'AWS', level: 70 } ], achievements: [ { icon: 'üöÄ', title: 'Fast Learner', description: 'Completed 5 courses in one month' }, { icon: 'üéØ', title: 'Goal Achiever', description: 'Met all learning goals this quarter' }, { icon: 'üí°', title: 'Knowledge Sharer', description: 'Helped 50+ students in forums' } ] }; activityData = [ { day: 'Mon', activity: 80 }, { day: 'Tue', activity: 60 }, { day: 'Wed', activity: 90 }, { day: 'Thu', activity: 70 }, { day: 'Fri', activity: 85 }, { day: 'Sat', activity: 40 }, { day: 'Sun', activity: 30 } ]; recentCourses = [ { title: 'Advanced React Patterns', image: 'https://picsum.photos/seed/react1/60/60', progress: 75 }, { title: 'Node.js Masterclass', image: 'https://picsum.photos/seed/node1/60/60', progress: 45 }, { title: 'AWS Cloud Practitioner', image: 'https://picsum.photos/seed/aws1/60/60', progress: 90 } ]; certificates = [ { title: 'JavaScript Expert', issuer: 'SkillForge', date: 'Dec 2024' }, { title: 'React Developer', issuer: 'SkillForge', date: 'Nov 2024' }, { title: 'AWS Certified', issuer: 'Amazon', date: 'Oct 2024' } ]; ngOnInit() {} }
